Room.Name: Sick Bay
Room.ShortDescription: You are in the sick bay of the pirate ship Widow Maker.
Room.LongDescription: Pirates don't really care to take care of the sick, but this is a good place for the sniveling whiners. And besides, it's better to put them here instead of keeping them around where others could catch something. The room is small and cramped, and smells like someone has puked in the corner. The place is overrun with mice.
